Directions: In a bowl, combine the flour, cornmeal, sugar, baking powder and salt.  Add egg substitute, milk and oil; stir just until moistened.  Fill miniature muffin cups coated with nonstick cooking spray three-fourths full.
Bake at 400 degrees F for 10-12 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.  Cool for 5 minutes before removing from pans to wire racks.
